name: Browser web storage examination
details: Web storage is a browser-based API bundled in HTML5 specifications that allow persistent client-side storage for web applications. (Mendoza 2015)
references: Mendoza, A., Kumar, A., Midcap, D., Cho, H. and Varol, C., 2015. BrowStEx: A tool to aggregate browser storage artifacts for forensic analysis. Digital investigation, 14, pp.63-75.
